200.text: The '%s' feature is experimental and unsupported, use %s to enable

201.text: The '%s' feature requires PHP %s or later

202.text: The feature 'class constant modifiers' requires PHP 7.1 or later

203.text: The feature 'list deconstruction with assignment by reference' requires PHP 7.3 or later

204.text: The feature 'list deconstruction by keys' requires PHP 7.1 or later

205.text: The feature 'shortened list deconstruction syntax' requires PHP 7.1 or later

206.text: The feature 'nullable types' requires PHP 7.1 or later

207.text: The feature 'spread operators in array initializers' requires PHP 7.4 or later

208.text: The feature 'trailing commas in argument lists' requires PHP 7.3 or later

209.text: The feature 'trailing commas in use declarations' requires PHP 7.2 or later

210.text: The feature 'try-catch union types' requires PHP 7.1 or later

211.text: The feature 'typed properties' requires PHP 7.4 or later

1001.text: Indentation contains both space and tab characters

1002.text: Indentation does not match that of the closing identifier

1005.text: Code point in unicode escape sequence is greater than U+10FFFF

1010.text: Octal escape sequence cannot be greater than \377 (255)

2002.text: An abstract class cannot be final

2005.text: An abstract method cannot have a body

2006.text: A positional argument must be used prior to unpacked arguments

2007.text: Class constants cannot be abstract, final, or static

2008.text: Interface members cannot be abstract or final

2009.text: Class properties cannot be abstract or final

2010.text: The modifier '%s' cannot be used on a trait alias

2011.text: The modifier '%s' cannot be used on a class, interface, or trait

2012.text: Base clause must precede an interface list

2015.text: Constant, method, or property declaration expected

2016.text: Expected a class name or a reference to evaluate as a class name

2026.text: At least one variable is required to deconstruct an expression

2027.text: A destructuring variable cannot be assigned by reference

2032.text: End of file found, expression expected

2033.text: The given expression does not have a usable address

2037.text: __halt_compiler() must be used in outermost scope

2042.text: Argument list, base clause, interface list, or '{' expected

2043.text: Expected an array initialization expression or destructuring assignment

2045.text: Base clause, interface list, or '{' expected

2047.text: Lexical variables, return type, or '{' expected

2048.text: Function name, closure parameters, or '&' expected

2050.text: Expected a namespace declaration or relative name

2054.text: Static variable list, initializer, or ';' expected

2056.text: Trait list, adaptation clause, or ';' expected

2057.text: Expected additional imported names, an alias, or ';' in use declaration

2058.text: Expected additional imported names, an alias, or '}' in use group clause

2059.text: Expected an identifier or use group clause

2060.text: Expected a variable or indirect expression to evaluate as a variable name

2062.text: The keyword 'implements' cannot be used on an interface

2068.text: Iteration depth in '%s' statement must be a constant integer

2069.text: Invalid token '%s' in class, interface, or trait member declaration

2071.text: A method reference requires a '::' after a class name

2074.text: Switch statements may only contain one 'default' label

2075.text: Classes may only inherit from one base class

2076.text: The modifier '%s' cannot be used with another visibility modifier

2091.text: An interpolated element access expression must specify an offset

2093.text: Expected an expression or the name of a variable

2099.text: A use type has already been specified

2100.text: Expected an imported type, constant, or function

2101.text: Expected an imported type, constant, function, or '}'

2105.text: A variadic parameter cannot have a default value

2106.text: A variadic parameter must be the last parameter of a function or method signature

2108.text: Possible mistaken empty statement (use '{}' if this was intended)

2109.text: The '(real)' type cast is deprecated, use '(float)' instead

2110.text: The '(unset)' type cast is deprecated, use 'null' instead
